artist: Ōkura Kōtō; Sugihara Kōsei; Publisher: Hasegawa Sumi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: LRC: 耕濤; ULC: 耕星
text: Portrait of Takeda Hidenobu (1853-1902) by Ōkura Kōtō. Inset picture by Sugihara Kōsei. No. 2 in the table of contents.
title: Picture of Lieutenant Colonel Takeda Smoking under a Hail of Bullets
